code:
%%{init: {'theme':'neutral'}}%%
flowchart TB
  subgraph Tenancy
    TEN((tenants))
  end
  subgraph IAM
    USR((users))
    ROL((roles))
    PRM((permissions))
  end
  subgraph Farm
    PND((ponds))
    CYC((production_cycles))
    MSR((fish_batch_measurements))
    FED((feeds))
    INV((inventory_transactions))
    WTR((water_quality_readings))
    DEV((iot_devices))
  end
  subgraph Accounting
    ACC((accounts))
    JEN((journal_entries))
    JLN((journal_lines))
    INVB((invoices))
    PUR((purchases))
  end

  TEN --> USR
  TEN --> ROL
  ROL --> PRM
  TEN --> PND
  PND --> CYC
  CYC --> MSR
  TEN --> FED
  TEN --> INV
  PND --> WTR
  TEN --> DEV
  TEN --> ACC
  ACC --> JEN --> JLN
  TEN --> INVB
  TEN --> PUR

  classDef tbl fill:#fff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class TEN,USR,ROL,PRM,PND,CYC,MSR,FED,INV,WTR,DEV,ACC,JEN,JLN,INVB,PUR tbl;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
